Reset.title: Reset starboard
Reset.confirm: Do you want to reset starboard? this action can not be undone and will remove all data and settings.
Reset.done_info: All data and settings for this server have been deleted.

Setup.already_setup: Starboard has already been setup. You can use the reset command to remove all data and config.
Setup.setup_confirm: Do you want to setup the bot? You need to create a starboard channel first.
Setup.enter_channel: Enter a channel to use for starboard.

StaffBypass.enabled: Staff bypass enabled, any bot admin or mod can star messages with no limit.

StaffOnly.enabled: Staff only enabled, you need to be a bot mod or admin to create starboard messages.

Help.update_notice: The bot has been fully updated with a new look and better support for message.
Help.info1: You can now star funny messages or memes that will be show in the starboard channel.
Help.info2: Add a star reaction to a message that is not your own message.

Minimum.info: Set how many star reactions are required to post a starboard message.
Minimum.error_limit: Number can not be less than 1 and more than 10.

Remove.info: Enter a message id to remove from the starboard channel.
Remove.no_message: This message is not in starboard.

Errors.dm: The features of this bot only work in a Discord server.
Errors.not_admin: You are not a bot admin.
Errors.not_mod: You are not a bot mod.
Errors.not_setup: You need to setup the bot with a starboard channel.
